title: Refactor AI Service Layer for Provider Agnosticism
description: Refactor the AI service layer to support multiple AI providers (e.g., OpenAI, Google Gemini) through a provider-agnostic interface. This involves defining an abstract AI service interface, implementing concrete adapters for each provider, and configuring the application to use the desired provider via dependency injection.
acceptance_criteria: The application can be configured to use either `OpenAIService` or `GeminiService` at runtime.
Existing `test_chat.py` is refactored to test the `IAIService` interface or specific provider implementations.
The `openai` dependency is only loaded when `OpenAIService` is configured.
The `gemini` dependency is only loaded when `GeminiService` is configured.
notes: This work item addresses the need for a truly generic AI framework by abstracting the AI provider layer.
